s104.title: Plan return to work
s104.summary: Employer must plan RTW from when incapacity known; includes obtaining capacity info, assessing duties, consulting, providing RTW details, and monitoring.

s105.title: Consult about RTW
s105.summary: Employer must consult with worker, treating practitioner (with consent), and OR provider as reasonable.

s111.title: Participate in planning for RTW
s111.summary: Worker must make reasonable efforts to actively participate and co-operate in RTW planning.

s113.title: Participate in assessments
s113.summary: Worker must participate in assessments of capacity, rehab progress, and employment prospects when requested (reasonable extent).

s115.title: Worker interviews
s115.summary: Agents may arrange interviews to optimise RTW opportunities; minimum notice applies (see Claims Manual 5.1.6).

s116.title: Non-compliance consequences
s116.summary: If worker fails to comply with RTW obligations, Agent may issue warnings or suspend/terminate payments.

5.1.1.title: Agent to assess worker's reasonable efforts
